content: I especially like the phrase "felony contempt of business-model." at the climax of the article. https://locusmag.com/2020/09/cory-doctorow-ip/

A long & good @Doctorow piece.

I abhor this:

Ventilators from Medtronic and tractors from John Deere use DRM to force you to get them repaired by the manu­facturer – and to scrap them when the manufacturer decides it’s time for you to buy a new one.

I abhor it as much as the Monsanto patented seeds that force farmers to re-license them every year.
